did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Tucson Hot Springs Hotel Company records 1922
did.abstract: Typescript (original) articles of incorporation, minutes of meetings, by-laws, and miscellaneous correspondence regarding the sale of securities.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Tucson Hot Springs Hotel Company records (AZ 382). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Board members: Mose Drachman, Monte Mansfeld, and John H. Campbell.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Typescript (original) articles of incorporation, minutes of meetings, by-laws, and miscellaneous correspondence regarding the sale of securities.
